data.title: #StopAsianHate - Suzilla: Family Business Podcast
data.meta_description:
There has been 500+ hate crimes targeted at Asian People this year alone. In Atlanta eight people killed with six of them Asian-American women.  It was a son of a pastor. A local Sheriff who stated, “Yesterday was a really bad day for him.”, made money on selling Asian Hate shirts with Facebook ads. A former president promoted that hatred for a year, but the tragedy is much older.
San Francisco, CA; Pendleton, OR; Tacoma; WA have tragic pasts
Executive Order 9066 and the Internment Camps of American Citizens from 1942 to 1945.
President Biden  signed an Executive order by in January denouncing anti-American discrimination. With the violence deeply rooted in American History, it is going to require effort and change to think beyond stereotypes.
data.text:
There has been 500+ hate crimes targeted at Asian People this year alone. In Atlanta eight people killed with six of them Asian-American women. It was a son of a pastor. A local Sheriff who stated, “Yesterday was a really bad day for him.”, made money on selling Asian Hate shirts with Facebook ads. A former president promoted that hatred for a year, but the tragedy is much older.

San Francisco, CA; Pendleton, OR; Tacoma; WA have tragic pasts

Executive Order 9066 and the Internment Camps of American Citizens from 1942 to 1945.

President Biden signed an Executive order by in January denouncing anti-American discrimination. With the violence deeply rooted in American History, it is going to require effort and change to think beyond stereotypes.
